notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.C., C.I., and L.M. (Luisa Mannina) designed the study coordinating the research groups; G.Z. performed the antioxidant and enzyme inhibition assays; A.D.S. and R.M. evaluated the cytotoxicity on cell lines; F.S. carried out the experiments on Helicobacter pylori; S.C. carried out the color analyses; C.F. and A.F. studied the volatile components using GC/MS; L.A. carried out the experiments on Candida, Malassezia, and G. mellonella; M.L. evaluated the polyphenolic fingerprint using HPLC; V.P. and R.G. studied the activity against S. aureus and related biofilm; M.D., S.C., and L.M. (Luigi Menghini) performed the extractions and followed the crop production.
